alert.note: Alert for Luna (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued January 11 at 11:53AM MST until January 11 at 1:45PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... South central Luna County in southwestern New Mexico... * Until 145 PM MST. * At 1151 AM MST, an area of blowing dust was over Sunshine. HAZARD...Near zero visibility with strong winds up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Emergency Management. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * Higway 11 between Deming and Columbus will be impacted. Locations impacted include... Deming and Sunshine. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
